column2: subetenorenjianha, shengmarenagaranishiteziyoudeari, katsu, zunyantoquanlitonitsuitepingdengdearu. renjianha, lixingtoliangxintooshoukerareteori, huinitongbaonojingshenomottexingdongshinakerebanaranai.

subeterenha, renzhong, pifunose, xing, yanyu, zongjiao, zhengzhishangsonotanoyijian, guomindemoshikuhashehuidechushen, caichan, mendesonotanodeweiyouhakorenileisuruikanaruziyouniyoruchabieomoshoukerukotonaku, konoxuanyannijiegerusubetenoquanlitoziyoutooxiangyousurukotogadekiru.

subetenorenha, fanoxianioitepingdengdeari, mata, ikanaruchabiemonashinifanopingdengnabaohuoshoukeruquanlioyousuru. subetenorenha, konoxuanyanniweifansuruikanaruchabieniduishitemo, mata, sonoyounachabieososonokasuikanaruxingweiniduishitemo, pingdengnabaohuoshoukeruquanlioyousuru.

herenmo, zijinosishi, jiazu, jiatingmoshikuhatongxinniduishite, hoshiimamaniganshesare, youhamingyujibixinyongniduishitegongjioshoukerukotohanai. renhasubete, konoyounagansheyouhagongjiniduishitefanobaohuoshoukeruquanlioyousuru.

chengniannonannuha, renzhong, guojiyouhazongjiaoniyoruikanaruzhixianomoshoukerukotonaku, hunyinshi, katsujiatingotsukuruquanlioyousuru. chengniannonannuha, hunyinzhongjibisonojiexiaonijishi, hunyinniguanshipingdengnoquanlioyousuru.

subeterenha, sixiang, liangxinjibizongjiaonoziyouoxiangyousuruquanlioyousuru. konoquanliha, zongjiaoyouhaxinnianobiangengsuruziyoubingbinidandudeyouhatanozhetogongtongshite, gongdeniyouhasideni, bujiao, xingshi, libaijibiyishiniyottezongjiaoyouhaxinnianobiaomingsuruziyouohanmu.

subeterenha, shehuino1yuantoshite, shehuibaozhangoshoukeruquanlioyoushi, katsu, guojiadenulijibiguojidexieliniyori, mata, geguonozuzhijibiziyuanniyingjite, zijinozunyantozijinorengenoziyounafazhantoniqiankukotonodekinaijingjide, shehuidejibiwenhuadequanlinoshixianniduisuruquanlioyousuru.

subeterenha, yishizhu, yiliaojibibiyaonashehuideshishedengniyori, zijijibijiazunojiankangjibifuzhini10fennashenghuoshuizhunobaochisuruquanlibingbinishiye, jibing, xinshenzhanghai, peiouzhenosiwang, laolingsonotabukekangliniyorushenghuobunengnochangheha, baozhangoshoukeruquanlioyousuru.

subeterenha, jiaoyuoshoukeruquanlioyousuru. jiaoyuha, shaonakutomochudengnojibijichudenoduanjienioiteha, wuchangdenakerebanaranai. chudengjiaoyuha, yiwudedenakerebanaranai. jishujiaoyujibizhiyejiaoyuha, 1banniliyongdekirumodenakerebanarazu, mata, gaodengjiaoyuha, nengliniyingji, subetenozhenihitoshikukaifangsareteinakerebanaranai.
